column1: Topic title: Lks nak masuk camp najib and stab mamak and anwar

column8: After creating waves for saying he was willing to work with PAS president Abdul Hadi Awang to save Malaysia, DAP stalwart Lim Kit Siang now says he is prepared to work with top BN leaders, including Prime Minister Najib Abdul Razak.Today, Lim said he is prepared to meet MCA, Gerakan, as well as other senior BN leaders, including Najib, to discuss how to “purge and cleanse Malaysia of infamy and ignominy” of being regarded worldwide as a global kleptocracy.Kesian mamak and anwar. Lks sudah pedup kalah so lks wanna join team pas and najib.
